description: CSS file containing variables for theme management and styles for the main application components, including responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for layout, background color, and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Style for the application logo with animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style for the application, including background color and layout properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for application links, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the theme toggle button, including sizing, colors, and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframes for spinning animation of the application logo.
